channel.title: Models folder? [508]
channel.description:
Hello people!
I've been searching though the forums on how to add custom models to my server. I realized that I don't have a 'Models' folder which is required. Someone said to just make one, he wasn't specific on where to make it exactly? Does it matter where I make the Models folder? If so, can anyone tell me where in my 508 source i need to make it? Help will be greatly appreciated! :D

item.title: Models folder? [508]
item.dc:creator: @cheeksahoy cheeksahoy
item.description:
@cheeksahoy wrote:

Oh, ok thanks guys… I was confused because of the guide i was using. Didn’t make much sense.

Can someone give me a link to a good Tut showing me how to put customs into 508 server, plz?

Read full topic

item.title: Models folder? [508]
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

Ok, there isn’t more than one way to make a folder there is just code that has to point to that folder and load the models within it but, i don’t have a clue as to what that code is for 508s

Read full topic

item.title: Models folder? [508]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I didn’t know there was more than one way to make a folder. The ‘models’ folder goes in your client folder.

Read full topic
